  quadsR: "M170.661 216.179L172.621 175.229C172.641 172.769 172.591 171.669 172.551 170.849V170.679C172.511 170.009 172.491 169.479 172.531 168.419C172.531 168.189 172.551 167.959 172.571 167.749C172.571 167.689 172.571 167.639 172.571 167.589C172.591 167.319 172.601 167.049 172.621 166.799L172.641 166.579C172.641 166.479 172.651 166.389 172.671 166.289C172.991 163.029 173.661 160.839 174.211 159.069L174.261 158.909C174.931 156.759 175.301 155.579 174.611 154.049C173.711 152.039 171.331 150.299 167.121 148.549C167.111 148.549 167.091 148.549 167.081 148.539H167.071C166.391 148.289 165.671 148.009 164.941 147.699C164.921 147.699 164.911 147.689 164.881 147.679C160.091 145.929 154.031 144.699 151.401 146.519C150.451 147.179 149.991 148.189 149.991 149.619C149.991 149.949 149.721 150.209 149.381 150.219C149.341 150.209 149.281 150.199 149.241 150.219C148.911 150.219 148.641 149.959 148.641 149.629C148.641 148.209 148.181 147.189 147.221 146.529C146.381 145.949 142.961 144.339 133.771 147.679L133.731 147.699H133.691C132.981 148.019 132.261 148.299 131.531 148.549C131.531 148.549 131.511 148.549 131.511 148.559C127.301 150.299 124.921 152.049 124.031 154.059C123.341 155.609 123.711 156.799 124.391 158.959C124.921 160.639 125.651 162.939 125.981 166.319C126.041 166.699 126.071 167.139 126.081 167.629C126.081 167.669 126.081 167.699 126.081 167.759C126.101 167.979 126.111 168.209 126.121 168.439C126.161 169.569 126.151 170.099 126.101 170.879C126.061 171.679 126.011 172.779 126.031 175.239C126.081 180.329 127.081 201.909 127.991 216.189C129.481 239.399 143.831 257.109 149.251 257.109C149.271 257.109 149.301 257.109 149.331 257.109C149.351 257.109 149.371 257.109 149.391 257.109C154.791 257.109 169.131 239.399 170.631 216.189H170.651L170.661 216.179Z",
  // Calves
  calvesL: "M119.781 393.659C117.791 395.549 115.631 396.889 113.441 397.579C113.121 397.689 112.801 397.779 112.481 397.849C112.321 399.079 112.131 400.439 111.941 401.869C111.151 407.639 110.181 414.739 109.801 420.719C109.181 430.409 113.071 433.509 117.601 437.129C117.711 437.219 117.821 437.309 117.931 437.399C117.931 437.389 117.931 437.379 117.941 437.369C117.941 437.349 117.951 437.339 117.961 437.319C117.961 437.289 117.981 437.269 117.981 437.239C118.471 435.579 119.171 434.599 119.851 433.659L119.871 433.629C121.721 431.069 123.621 428.429 120.911 408.879C119.851 399.579 119.501 395.839 119.771 393.669L119.781 393.659Z",
  calvesR: "M186.201 397.839C185.891 397.769 185.571 397.689 185.251 397.579C183.061 396.879 180.901 395.539 178.911 393.649C179.181 395.819 178.831 399.559 177.771 408.859C175.061 428.399 176.971 431.049 178.811 433.599L178.841 433.639C179.511 434.579 180.211 435.559 180.701 437.209C180.721 437.259 180.731 437.319 180.751 437.369L181.081 437.099C185.611 433.489 189.491 430.379 188.881 420.689C188.501 414.699 187.531 407.599 186.741 401.839C186.541 400.399 186.361 399.049 186.201 397.819V397.839Z",
  // Calves inside
  calvesLInside: "M119.781 393.659C117.791 395.549 115.631 396.889 113.441 397.579C113.121 397.689 112.801 397.779 112.481 397.849C112.321 399.079 112.131 400.439 111.941 401.869C111.151 407.639 110.181 414.739 109.801 420.719C109.181 430.409 113.071 433.509 117.601 437.129C117.711 437.219 117.821 437.309 117.931 437.399C117.931 437.389 117.931 437.379 117.941 437.369C117.941 437.349 117.951 437.339 117.961 437.319C117.961 437.289 117.981 437.269 117.981 437.239C118.471 435.579 119.171 434.599 119.851 433.659L119.871 433.629C121.721 431.069 123.621 428.429 120.911 408.879C119.851 399.579 119.501 395.839 119.771 393.669L119.781 393.659Z",
  calvesRInside: "M186.201 397.839C185.891 397.769 185.571 397.689 185.251 397.579C183.061 396.879 180.901 395.539 178.911 393.649C179.181 395.819 178.831 399.559 177.771 408.859C175.061 428.399 176.971 431.049 178.811 433.599L178.841 433.639C179.511 434.579 180.211 435.559 180.701 437.209C180.721 437.259 180.731 437.319 180.751 437.369L181.081 437.099C185.611 433.489 189.491 430.379 188.881 420.689C188.501 414.699 187.531 407.599 186.741 401.839C186.541 400.399 186.361 399.049 186.201 397.819V397.839Z",
  // Shoulders left and right
  shoulderL: "M127.991 216.189C129.481 239.399 143.831 257.109 149.251 257.109C149.271 257.109 149.301 257.109 149.331 257.109C149.351 257.109 149.371 257.109 149.391 257.109C154.791 257.109 169.131 239.399 170.631 216.189L170.651 216.179C171.591 201.719 172.581 180.159 172.621 175.229C172.641 172.769 172.591 171.669 172.551 170.849V170.679C172.511 170.009 172.491 169.479 172.531 168.419C172.531 168.189 172.551 167.959 172.571 167.749C172.571 167.689 172.571 167.639 172.571 167.589C172.591 167.319 172.601 167.049 172.621 166.799L172.641 166.579C172.641 166.479 172.651 166.389 172.671 166.289C172.991 163.029 173.661 160.839 174.211 159.069L174.261 158.909C174.931 156.759 175.301 155.579 174.611 154.049C173.711 152.039 171.331 150.299 167.121 148.549C167.111 148.549 167.091 148.549 167.081 148.539H167.071C166.391 148.289 165.671 148.009 164.941 147.699C164.921 147.699 164.911 147.689 164.881 147.679C160.091 145.929 154.031 144.699 151.401 146.519C150.451 147.179 149.991 148.189 149.991 149.619C149.991 149.949 149.721 150.209 149.381 150.219C149.341 150.209 149.281 150.199 149.241 150.219C148.911 150.219 148.641 149.959 148.641 149.629C148.641 148.209 148.181 147.189 147.221 146.529C146.381 145.949 142.961 144.339 133.771 147.679L133.731 147.699H133.691C132.981 148.019 132.261 148.299 131.531 148.549C131.531 148.549 131.511 148.549 131.511 148.559C127.301 150.299 124.921 152.049 124.031 154.059C123.341 155.609 123.711 156.799 124.391 158.959C124.921 160.639 125.651 162.939 125.981 166.319C126.041 166.699 126.071 167.139 126.081 167.629C126.081 167.669 126.081 167.699 126.081 167.759C126.101 167.979 126.111 168.209 126.121 168.439C126.161 169.569 126.151 170.099 126.101 170.879C126.061 171.679 126.011 172.779 126.031 175.239C126.081 180.329 127.081 201.909 127.991 216.189Z",
  shoulderR: "M170.661 216.179C171.591 201.719 172.581 180.159 172.621 175.229C172.641 172.769 172.591 171.669 172.551 170.849V170.679C172.511 170.009 172.491 169.479 172.531 168.419C172.531 168.189 172.551 167.959 172.571 167.749C172.571 167.689 172.571 167.639 172.571 167.589C172.591 167.319 172.601 167.049 172.621 166.799L172.641 166.579C172.641 166.479 172.651 166.389 172.671 166.289C172.991 163.029 173.661 160.839 174.211 159.069L174.261 158.909C174.931 156.759 175.301 155.579 174.611 154.049C173.711 152.039 171.331 150.299 167.121 148.549C167.111 148.549 167.091 148.549 167.081 148.539H167.071C166.391 148.289 165.671 148.009 164.941 147.699C164.921 147.699 164.911 147.689 164.881 147.679C160.091 145.929 154.031 144.699 151.401 146.519C150.451 147.179 149.991 148.189 149.991 149.619C149.991 149.949 149.721 150.209 149.381 150.219C149.341 150.209 149.281 150.199 149.241 150.219C148.911 150.219 148.641 149.959 148.641 149.629C148.641 148.209 148.181 147.189 147.221 146.529C146.381 145.949 142.961 144.339 133.771 147.679L133.731 147.699H133.691C132.981 148.019 132.261 148.299 131.531 148.549C131.531 148.549 131.511 148.549 131.511 148.559C127.301 150.299 124.921 152.049 124.031 154.059C123.341 155.609 123.711 156.799 124.391 158.959C124.921 160.639 125.651 162.939 125.981 166.319C126.041 166.699 126.071 167.139 126.081 167.629C126.081 167.669 126.081 167.699 126.081 167.759C126.101 167.979 126.111 168.209 126.121 168.439C126.161 169.569 126.151 170.099 126.101 170.879C126.061 171.679 126.011 172.779 126.031 175.239C126.081 180.329 127.081 201.909 127.991 216.189C129.481 239.399 143.831 257.109 149.251 257.109C149.271 257.109 149.301 257.109 149.331 257.109C149.351 257.109 149.371 257.109 149.391 257.109C154.791 257.109 169.131 239.399 170.631 216.189H170.651L170.661 216.179Z",
};

// Naming mapping for muscle group IDs to Dutch names
export const muscleGroupNames: Record<string, string> = {
  chestL: 'Borst (links)',
  chestR: 'Borst (rechts)',
  shoulders: 'Schouders',
  bicepsL: 'Biceps (links)',
  bicepsR: 'Biceps (rechts)',
  underarmL: 'Onderarmen (links)',
  underarmR: 'Onderarmen (rechts)',
  trapL: 'Trapezius (links)',
  trapR: 'Trapezius (rechts)',
  abs: 'Buikspieren',
  obliqueL: 'Obliques (links)',
  obliqueR: 'Obliques (rechts)',
  quadsL: 'Quadriceps (links)',
  quadsR: 'Quadriceps (rechts)',
  calvesL: 'Kuiten (links)',
  calvesR: 'Kuiten (rechts)',
  calvesLInside: 'Kuiten binnenkant (links)',
  calvesRInside: 'Kuiten binnenkant (rechts)',
  shoulderL: 'Schouders (links)',
  shoulderR: 'Schouders (rechts)',
};

export const InteractiveBody: React.FC<InteractiveBodyProps> = ({
  selectedMuscleGroup,
  onMuscleGroupClick,
  onMuscleGroupHover,
  hoveredMuscleGroup,
}) => {
  const getFillColor = (muscleGroup: string) => {
    if (selectedMuscleGroup === muscleGroup) {
      return '#FF6B6B';
    }
    if (hoveredMuscleGroup === muscleGroup) {
      return '#FFD93D';
    }
    return '#E0E0E0';
  };

  const getStrokeWidth = (muscleGroup: string) => {
    if (selectedMuscleGroup === muscleGroup || hoveredMuscleGroup === muscleGroup) {
      return 2;
    }
    return 1;
  };

  return (
    <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', width: '100%', mb: 3 }}>
      <svg
        viewBox="0 0 300 450"
        width="100%"
        height="auto"
        style={{ maxWidth: '400px', height: 'auto' }}
      >
        {/* Chest Left */}
        <path
          d={muscleGroupPaths.chestL}
          fill={getFillColor('chestL')}
          stroke="black"
          strokeWidth={getStrokeWidth('chestL')}
          cursor="pointer"
          onClick={() => onMuscleGroupClick('chestL')}
          onMouseEnter={() => onMuscleGroupHover && onMuscleGroupHover('chestL')}
          onMouseLeave={() => onMuscleGroupHover && onMuscleGroupHover(null)}
        />
        {/* Chest Right */}
        <path
          d={muscleGroupPaths.chestR}
          fill={getFillColor('chestR')}
          stroke="black"
          strokeWidth={getStrokeWidth('chestR')}
          cursor="pointer"
          onClick={() => onMuscleGroupClick('chestR')}
          onMouseEnter={() => onMuscleGroupHover && onMuscleGroupHover('chestR')}
          onMouseLeave={() => onMuscleGroupHover && onMuscleGroupHover(null)}
        />
        {/* Shoulders */}
        <path
          d={muscleGroupPaths.shoulders}
          fill={getFillColor('shoulders')}
          stroke="black"
          strokeWidth={getStrokeWidth('shoulders')}
          cursor="pointer"
          onClick={() => onMuscleGroupClick('shoulders')}
          onMouseEnter={() => onMuscleGroupHover && onMuscleGroupHover('shoulders')}
          onMouseLeave={() => onMuscleGroupHover && onMuscleGroupHover(null)}
        />
        {/* Biceps Left */}
        <path
          d={muscleGroupPaths.bicepsL}
          fill={getFillColor('bicepsL')}
          stroke="black"
          strokeWidth={getStrokeWidth('bicepsL')}
          cursor="pointer"
          onClick={() => onMuscleGroupClick('bicepsL')}
          onMouseEnter={() => onMuscleGroupHover && onMuscleGroupHover('bicepsL')}
          onMouseLeave={() => onMuscleGroupHover && onMuscleGroupHover(null)}
        />
        {/* Biceps Right */}
        <path
          d={muscleGroupPaths.bicepsR}
          fill={getFillColor('bicepsR')}
          stroke="black"
          strokeWidth={getStrokeWidth('bicepsR')}
          cursor="pointer"
          onClick={() => onMuscleGroupClick('bicepsR')}
          onMouseEnter={() => onMuscleGroupHover && onMuscleGroupHover('bicepsR')}
          onMouseLeave={() => onMuscleGroupHover && onMuscleGroupHover(null)}
        />
        {/* Underarms Left */}
        <path
          d={muscleGroupPaths.underarmL}
          fill={getFillColor('underarmL')}
          stroke="black"
          strokeWidth={getStrokeWidth('underarmL')}
          cursor="pointer"
          onClick={() => onMuscleGroupClick('underarmL')}
          onMouseEnter={() => onMuscleGroupHover && onMuscleGroupHover('underarmL')}
          onMouseLeave={() => onMuscleGroupHover && onMuscleGroupHover(null)}
        />
        {/* Underarms Right */}
        <path
          d={muscleGroupPaths.underarmR}
          fill={getFillColor('underarmR')}
          stroke="black"
          strokeWidth={getStrokeWidth('underarmR')}
          cursor="pointer"
          onClick={() => onMuscleGroupClick('underarmR')}
          onMouseEnter={() => onMuscleGroupHover && onMuscleGroupHover('underarmR')}
          onMouseLeave={() => onMuscleGroupHover && onMuscleGroupHover(null)}
        />
        {/* Trapezius Left */}
        <path
          d={muscleGroupPaths.trapL}
          fill={getFillColor('trapL')}
          stroke="black"
          strokeWidth={getStrokeWidth('trapL')}
          cursor="pointer"
          onClick={() => onMuscleGroupClick('trapL')}
          onMouseEnter={() => onMuscleGroupHover && onMuscleGroupHover('trapL')}
          onMouseLeave={() => onMuscleGroupHover && onMuscleGroupHover(null)}
        />
        {/* Trapezius Right */}
        <path
          d={muscleGroupPaths.trapR}
          fill={getFillColor('trapR')}
          stroke="black"
          strokeWidth={getStrokeWidth('trapR')}
          cursor="pointer"
          onClick={() => onMuscleGroupClick('trapR')}
          onMouseEnter={() => onMuscleGroupHover && onMuscleGroupHover('trapR')}
          onMouseLeave={() => onMuscleGroupHover && onMuscleGroupHover(null)}
        />
        {/* Abs */}
        <path
          d={muscleGroupPaths.abs}
          fill={getFillColor('abs')}
          stroke="black"
          strokeWidth={getStrokeWidth('abs')}
          cursor="pointer"
          onClick={() => onMuscleGroupClick('abs')}
          onMouseEnter={() => onMuscleGroupHover && onMuscleGroupHover('abs')}
          onMouseLeave={() => onMuscleGroupHover && onMuscleGroupHover(null)}
        />
        {/* Obliques Left */}
        <path
          d={muscleGroupPaths.obliqueL}
          fill={getFillColor('obliqueL')}
          stroke="black"
          strokeWidth={getStrokeWidth('obliqueL')}
          cursor="pointer"
          onClick={() => onMuscleGroupClick('obliqueL')}
          onMouseEnter={() => onMuscleGroupHover && onMuscleGroupHover('obliqueL')}
          onMouseLeave={() => onMuscleGroupHover && onMuscleGroupHover(null)}
        />
        {/* Obliques Right */}
        <path
          d={muscleGroupPaths.obliqueR}
          fill={getFillColor('obliqueR')}
          stroke="black"
          strokeWidth={getStrokeWidth('obliqueR')}
          cursor="pointer"
          onClick={() => onMuscleGroupClick('obliqueR')}
          onMouseEnter={() => onMuscleGroupHover && onMuscleGroupHover('obliqueR')}
          onMouseLeave={() => onMuscleGroupHover && onMuscleGroupHover(null)}
        />
        {/* Quads Left */}
        <path
          d={muscleGroupPaths.quadsL}
          fill={getFillColor('quadsL')}
          stroke="black"
          strokeWidth={getStrokeWidth('quadsL')}
          cursor="pointer"
          onClick={() => onMuscleGroupClick('quadsL')}
          onMouseEnter={() => onMuscleGroupHover && onMuscleGroupHover('quadsL')}
          onMouseLeave={() => onMuscleGroupHover && onMuscleGroupHover(null)}
        />
        {/* Quads Right */}
        <path
          d={muscleGroupPaths.quadsR}
          fill={getFillColor('quadsR')}
          stroke="black"
          strokeWidth={getStrokeWidth('quadsR')}
          cursor="pointer"
          onClick={() => onMuscleGroupClick('quadsR')}
          onMouseEnter={() => onMuscleGroupHover && onMuscleGroupHover('quadsR')}
          onMouseLeave={() => onMuscleGroupHover && onMuscleGroupHover(null)}
        />
        {/* Calves Left */}
        <path
          d={muscleGroupPaths.calvesL}
          fill={getFillColor('calvesL')}
          stroke="black"
          strokeWidth={getStrokeWidth('calvesL')}
          cursor="pointer"
          onClick={() => onMuscleGroupClick('calvesL')}
          onMouseEnter={() => onMuscleGroupHover && onMuscleGroupHover('calvesL')}
          onMouseLeave={() => onMuscleGroupHover && onMuscleGroupHover(null)}
        />
        {/* Calves Right */}
        <path
          d={muscleGroupPaths.calvesR}
          fill={getFillColor('calvesR')}
          stroke="black"
          strokeWidth={getStrokeWidth('calvesR')}
          cursor="pointer"
          onClick={() => onMuscleGroupClick('calvesR')}
          onMouseEnter={() => onMuscleGroupHover && onMuscleGroupHover('calvesR')}
          onMouseLeave={() => onMuscleGroupHover && onMuscleGroupHover(null)}
        />
        {/* Calves Inside Left */}
        <path
          d={muscleGroupPaths.calvesLInside}
          fill={getFillColor('calvesLInside')}
          stroke="black"
          strokeWidth={getStrokeWidth('calvesLInside')}
          cursor="pointer"
          onClick={() => onMuscleGroupClick('calvesLInside')}
          onMouseEnter={() => onMuscleGroupHover && onMuscleGroupHover('calvesLInside')}
          onMouseLeave={() => onMuscleGroupHover && onMuscleGroupHover(null)}
        />
        {/* Calves Inside Right */}
        <path
          d={muscleGroupPaths.calvesRInside}
          fill={getFillColor('calvesRInside')}
          stroke="black"
          strokeWidth={getStrokeWidth('calvesRInside')}
          cursor="pointer"
          onClick={() => onMuscleGroupClick('calvesRInside')}
          onMouseEnter={() => onMuscleGroupHover && onMuscleGroupHover('calvesRInside')}
          onMouseLeave={() => onMuscleGroupHover && onMuscleGroupHover(null)}
        />
        {/* Shoulders Left */}
        <path
          d={muscleGroupPaths.shoulderL}
          fill={getFillColor('shoulderL')}
          stroke="black"
          strokeWidth={getStrokeWidth('shoulderL')}
          cursor="pointer"
          onClick={() => onMuscleGroupClick('shoulderL')}
          onMouseEnter={() => onMuscleGroupHover && onMuscleGroupHover('shoulderL')}
          onMouseLeave={() => onMuscleGroupHover && onMuscleGroupHover(null)}
        />
        {/* Shoulders Right */}
        <path
          d={muscleGroupPaths.shoulderR}
          fill={getFillColor('shoulderR')}
          stroke="black"
          strokeWidth={getStrokeWidth('shoulderR')}
          cursor="pointer"
          onClick={() => onMuscleGroupClick('shoulderR')}
          onMouseEnter={() => onMuscleGroupHover && onMuscleGroupHover('shoulderR')}
          onMouseLeave={() => onMuscleGroupHover && onMuscleGroupHover(null)}
        />
      </svg>
    </Box>
  );
};
